/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with shadows subtly hinting at the time of day. The overall composition of the image, with its blend of natural and man-made elements, paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of this bustling city.
